column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Awesome place
column2: west european style high quality bread  and other baked goods.  They also have warm sandwiches and other savory dishes.  They do dinner too
column4: fried chicken) and serve alcohol ($5 Karbach cans
column7: full of people at most hours
column8: there's a line out the door already at 8am. Navigating a stroller is tricky (but possible)
column9: if you can't fit past the main door
column10: you can push your stroller up the ramp on the side entrance to the patio on Dunlavy.
